channel.title: RiotSide.us //317 RSPS // *NEW*
channel.description:
[center][img]http://riotside.us/images/RiotSideBanner.png[/img]
[b]Riot-Side is a brand new 317 Runescape Private Server that features Mac accessibility, over 25 bosses, 8 working minigames, A close to perfect economy, a dedicated and helpful staff, customs, balanced drop rates, flawless pvp, perfect gear switching, with all skills working and 0 downtime. We also have a donor zone that is filled to the brim with donor only features. Here are some of the bosses we have,
Avatar of Destruction Avatar of Creation PlaneFreezer Nightgazer Bal'Lak Nezikchened Fully working GWD FUlly working barrows KBD, And that's not even half of them.
Here's a few of our minigames Warriors guild, Pest Control, Barbarian Assault, Dominion Tower, Tzhaar fight caves, Duel arena, and more.
We hope you found interest and hope to see you in game![/b]
[size=24pt][url=http://riotside.us]RiotSide.us[/url][/size]
You can find the client downloads on a thread called "Play"
[font=arial black][size=24pt]And we are mac compatible![/size][/font][/center]

item.title: RiotSide.us //317 RSPS // *NEW*
item.dc:creator: @system system

@system wrote:

This guy was on crack when he posted this.
